{Xiane}

    Xiane was thrown off his feet when the missile hit, he had gotten up his
sheild but its waning power did little to cushion the blast. As the bot
pushed himself up he noticed he did so minus his sheild arm, the explosion
having torn the limb from the torso when the remainder of the blast had
gotten past the sheild.

    Looking at Punch he picked up his sword and charged forward, "Tis not
but a scratch I say!" he said as he swung the energon blade at the bot...
